title: Photos
description: Add high-quality photos to showcase your property.
chooseMethod: How would you like to add photos?
cameraRollPermission: We need access to your photo library to add images.
cameraPermission: We need access to your camera to take photos.
uploadError: Failed to upload images. Please try again.
pickError: Failed to pick images. Please try again.
cameraError: Failed to take photo. Please try again.
tipContent: High-quality photos help guests get a better sense of your property and increase bookings. Use natural lighting and show off your best features.
tips: Include different areas of your space
photoSizeLimit: Photo size must be less than 10MB
